articles.title: Election of deputies to 11th Supreme People's Assembly of DPRK to be held
Students affiliated to Hanchongryon stage surprise demo in S. Korea
articles.content:
Election of deputies to 11th Supreme People's Assembly of DPRK to be held 
    Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A decision of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly on holding the election of deputies to the SPA of the DPRK was made public on June 3.
 According to the decision, the election of deputies to the 11th SPA will be held on August 3, Juche 92 (2003), in accordance with article 90 of the DPRK Socialist Constitution.
